name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Takanashi Kiara 4th Anniversary Live ~「MIRAGE」WITH A SURPRISE!？ #Kiara4years [0LoG81pLS8c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Kiara and Iroha conclude their performance of 'Beat Eater'.
MC segment where Kiara and Iroha talk about the performance, their rehearsals, and Iroha's English.
Ninomae Ina'nis joins Kiara for a performance of 'Iyaiya-iya'.
scenes.song_name: い〜やい〜やい〜や (Whatever, whatever, whatever)

subtitles.original: 世界は完　完
subtitles.english: The world is...

subtitles.original: あくまで踊ってたいだけ
subtitles.english: I just want to keep dancing

subtitles.original: Give it up だ 今は lonely
subtitles.english: Give it up, now I'm lonely

subtitles.original: 止まりたくないのに
subtitles.english: Even though I don't want to stop

subtitles.original: ヤバい なんとなくなのに
subtitles.english: It's dangerous, even though it's somehow...

subtitles.original: 見透かされてんのに
subtitles.english: Even though I'm being seen through

subtitles.original: Hey!
subtitles.english: Hey!

subtitles.original: Wooo! Yatta! Dekimashita! "Beat Eater"!
subtitles.english: Wooo! We did it! We performed "Beat Eater"!

subtitles.original: Yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: Iroha-chan, welcome!
subtitles.english: Iroha-chan, welcome!

subtitles.original: Introduction, please!
subtitles.english: Introduction, please!

subtitles.original: Hello! My name is Iroha Kazama.
subtitles.english: Hello! My name is Iroha Kazama.

subtitles.original: Japanese Hololive 6th generation HoloX.
subtitles.english: Japanese Hololive 6th generation HoloX.

subtitles.original: よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: Welcome! Yatta! Iroha-chan!
subtitles.english: Welcome! We did it! Iroha-chan!

subtitles.original: We sang Beat Eater together.
subtitles.english: We sang Beat Eater together.

subtitles.original: I'm so happy because I really, really love this song.
subtitles.english: I'm so happy because I really, really love this song.

subtitles.original: And when I chose it, I thought I need someone who can dance really well,
subtitles.english: And when I chose it, I thought I need someone who can dance really well,

subtitles.original: which is Iroha-chan.
subtitles.english: which is Iroha-chan.

subtitles.original: But then after I already chose you, I realized when I was looking up "Beat Eater" on YouTube...
subtitles.english: But then after I already chose you, I realized when I was looking up "Beat Eater" on YouTube...

subtitles.original: I found your cover! I was like, eh? She sang this already?!
subtitles.english: I found your cover! I was like, eh? She sang this already?!

subtitles.original: もうカバーしてる！
subtitles.english: You've already covered it!

subtitles.original: Yes, そうです！　だから今回誘ってもらえて...
subtitles.english: Yes, that's right! So being invited this time...

subtitles.original: ...とってもとっても嬉しくて。"Beat Eater" so very, very pop and cool song.
subtitles.english: ...I'm very, very happy. "Beat Eater" is such a pop and cool song.

subtitles.original: I love it! So thank you today!
subtitles.english: I love it! So thank you today!

subtitles.original: Yes, thank you!
subtitles.english: Yes, thank you!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！ Live guest, thank you ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Live guest, thank you, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Well, it was a very like dance-focused song, so I wonder what dance move was difficult for you?
subtitles.english: Well, it was a very like dance-focused song, so I wonder what dance move was difficult for you?

subtitles.original: やっぱり、サビ。
subtitles.english: As expected, the chorus.

subtitles.original: サビ？
subtitles.english: The chorus?

subtitles.original: Tu-tu-tu-tu-tu... そこ！
subtitles.english: Tu-tu-tu-tu-tu... There!

subtitles.original: Beat Eater...
subtitles.english: Beat Eater...

subtitles.original: So waving, so very, very difficult.
subtitles.english: So waving, so very, very difficult.

subtitles.original: Actually I also just like today I finally understood.
subtitles.english: Actually I also just like today I finally understood.

subtitles.original: 今日やっと把握できたと思う。
subtitles.english: I think I finally got the hang of it today.

subtitles.original: で、rehearsal together, lesson... mm?
subtitles.english: And we rehearsed together, had lessons... mm?

subtitles.original: Hm? This way? Hm?
subtitles.english: Hm? This way? Hm?

subtitles.original: Yeah, ってことでやりましたもんね。
subtitles.english: Yeah, so we did it together.

subtitles.original: For me, there's like, you know when I overthink?
subtitles.english: For me, there's like, you know when I overthink?

subtitles.original: Overthinking, then I like forget how to do the simplest things...
subtitles.english: Overthinking, then I like forget how to do the simplest things...

subtitles.original: ...even though I know that I know it.
subtitles.english: ...even though I know that I know it.

subtitles.original: So there was this one move... you like step forward...
subtitles.english: So there was this one move... you like step forward...

subtitles.original: ...and when you step, you like kick the other leg back, right?
subtitles.english: ...and when you step, you like kick the other leg back, right?

subtitles.original: And then you put it to the front and we add the hand, right?
subtitles.english: And then you put it to the front and we add the hand, right?

subtitles.original: So it's like this, but I overthink and I like stumble over my legs...
subtitles.english: So it's like this, but I overthink and I like stumble over my legs...

subtitles.original: Step, kick, wave, more, more resource...
subtitles.english: Step, kick, wave, more, more resource...

subtitles.original: So I had to do it a hundred times so that I stop overthinking.
subtitles.english: So I had to do it a hundred times so that I stop overthinking.

subtitles.original: Oh my god! But Kiara-senpai practicing so hard!
subtitles.english: Oh my god! But Kiara-senpai practicing so hard!

subtitles.original: Iroha-chan too!
subtitles.english: Iroha-chan too!

subtitles.original: So together, practice together very fun! Yes!
subtitles.english: So together, practicing together was very fun! Yes!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！　楽しかった！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much! It was fun!

subtitles.original: 本当に楽しかった！　ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: It was really fun! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Let's do it again sometime.
subtitles.english: Let's do it again sometime.

subtitles.original: Yes! So singing and dancing, so together, yes!
subtitles.english: Yes! So singing and dancing, so together, yes!

subtitles.original: Also Iroha-chan, very nice English!
subtitles.english: Also Iroha-chan, very nice English!

subtitles.original: No, no, zako zako English! No nice English!
subtitles.english: No, no, pathetic English! Not nice English!

subtitles.original: マジ助かる、助かる。
subtitles.english: It really helps, it helps.

subtitles.original: More English practice hard, 頑張ります！
subtitles.english: I'll practice English harder and do my best!

subtitles.original: Okay! So with that we move on to the next song...
subtitles.english: Okay! So with that we move on to the next song...

subtitles.original: ...and the next guest! Who could it be?
subtitles.english: ...and the next guest! Who could it be?

subtitles.original: Bye-bye guys! See you next song! Bye-bye next guest! Yeah!
subtitles.english: Bye-bye guys! See you next song! Bye-bye next guest! Yeah!

subtitles.original: い〜やい〜やい〜や
subtitles.english: Ya ya ya ya

subtitles.english:

subtitles.original: い〜やい〜やい〜や
subtitles.english: Whatever, whatever, whatever

subtitles.original: くたばってる頭脳　ぽしゃった
subtitles.english: My brain is exhausted and failed

subtitles.original: この怠惰が憎いな
subtitles.english: I hate this laziness

subtitles.original: またこうしてベッドで　また寝腐っている
subtitles.english: Lying in bed and rotting away again like this

subtitles.original: ここ最近　調子悪いな
subtitles.english: I've been out of sorts lately

subtitles.original: いや　本気はまたまた
subtitles.english: No, I'm still not serious

subtitles.original: そう言ったのはこれで何度目のセリフだろう
subtitles.english: I wonder how many times I've said that phrase by now

subtitles.original: 無造作な部屋　一人の両目
subtitles.english: A messy room, one pair of eyes

subtitles.original: 隠れ際　机の下で
subtitles.english: Hiding under the table

subtitles.original: 午前二時もせぬ　身なりは三流
subtitles.english: Not even 2 AM, my appearance is low-class

subtitles.original: お涙はどうぞ頂戴
subtitles.english: Please give me some tears

subtitles.original: 僕らどうせ聖者じゃないさ
subtitles.english: We're not saints anyway

subtitles.original: だから終止でいいや
subtitles.english: So a full stop is fine

subtitles.original: ノー・サンキューさ　い〜やい〜やい〜や
subtitles.english: No thank you, whatever, whatever, whatever

subtitles.original: クリンゼ　一生ナンセンスだっていいや
subtitles.english: A whole life of nonsense is fine

subtitles.original: ノー・サンキューさ　い〜やい〜やい〜や
subtitles.english: No thank you, whatever, whatever, whatever

subtitles.original: 最低で結構　堂々食っていいや
subtitles.english: Lowest is fine, it's okay to be unashamedly proud

subtitles.original: よ、センチメンタル相まって
subtitles.english: Mixed with sentimentality

subtitles.original: 一年中のボケ数も
subtitles.english: And year-round foolishness

subtitles.original: 140文字のポエムに放っている
subtitles.english: Unleashing it in a 140-character poem

subtitles.original: これ外にパッと決まったなら
subtitles.english: If this was suddenly decided outside...
